text: Arthur Frank Furze (1903-1982) was a male athlete who competed for England. ==Athletics career== Furze won a bronze medal in the 6 miles at the 1934 British Empire Games in London. ==References== Category:1903 births Category:1982 deaths Category:English male long-distance runners Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1934 British Empire Games Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in athletics Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for England
title: Arthur Furze
